bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Learning Technology -- Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation
IEEE Recommended Practice for Learning Technology -- Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) Mapping to the Conceptual Model for Resource Aggregation

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in the Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1™-2012.

This recommended practice specifies how the elements and attributes defined in the Metadata Encoding and Transmission Standard (METS) relate to the components of the conceptual model for resource aggregation defined in IEEE Std 1484.13.1(TM)-2012.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
